name: Coloring Book for Adults #HoliColoring
description:
Coloring books for adults HOLI is a journey into the world of peace and relaxation, a moment for yourself, escape from the everyday hustle and bustle. Treat yourself to a bit of free time in the beautiful world of colors, images and shapes.

HOLI Coloring book for adults:
1. Use your imagination and creativity (choose colors, hue and shapes)
2. Relax and unwind after a long day (anti-stress and relaxation)
3. Colorize beautiful mandala paintings and show them to the world
4. Express yourself, show feelings and emotions
5. Listen to the sounds of nature
6. Develop your eye-hand coordination
7. Take a journey through colors of spring, summer, autumn, winter
8. Color Therapy. Create your own color palette.
